1.text: Find the soft eye of the coconut.

2.text: Use a sharp tool to make a hole in the soft eye.

3.text: Drain the water into a bowl, jar, or cup.

5.text: Tap along the equator gently until the coconut cracks in half.

6.text: Pry open the coconut if it doesn't separate naturally.

7.text: Hold a coconut section in one hand with your cutting knife in the other.

8.text: Make a cut into the coconut, pressing down until you reach the shell.

9.text: Angle your next cut against the previous cut to form an upside-down V.

10.text: Pry the meat from this cut section using a dull knife.

11.text: Cut the rest of the sections to remove all of the meat.
